House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend temporarily the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to correct the duty treatment of timing apparatus with opto-electronic display only.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the duty treatment of time-recorders that are battery or AC powered with opto-electronic display only. Provides for retroactive application of this Act, upon request filed by a certain deadline, for liquidation or relinquishment of any entry or withdrawal after December 31, 1988, and the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: To amend temporarily the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to correct the duty treatment of timing apparatus with opto-electronic display only.
